name: Fast And Ferret: Socks Bonanza
description:
Bring socks to your ferret bed of your color. 2 players game (PvP). Jump on your opponent to stun them and steal their sock. Eat star treats to gather boost energy (need 4 for 1 boost). Release boost to move faster for a short period of time.

The game controls are mapped for PS4 Controller. Might work for other controllers (not guaranteed).

X for jump

Square to use boost

Left joystick to move

Triangle to quit game (menu only)
